typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	SourceTableName as string (""),
	TargetTableName as string (""),
	PrimaryKey as string (""),
	TimestampColumn as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'syn-fs',
	folderPath: 'delta/bronze/Customer') ~> BronzeDelta
BronzeDelta derive(PkColumn = byName($PrimaryKey),
		TSColumn = byName($TimestampColumn)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 window(over(PkColumn),
	desc(TSColumn, true),
	RowVersion = denseRank()) ~> Window1
Window1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'syn-fs',
	folderPath: (concat("delta/silver/",$SourceTableName,"/")),
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SilverDelta
